reviews.review: 友達とワイワイやるならサバイバー、一人で黙々とやるならキラー。二つのプレイスタイルがあるので飽きない。キャラクター背景もしっかり作りこまれていて魅力的。対人ゲームなのでチーターや煽りプレイヤーもいるが、殆どは優しい人ばかり。ブライトというキラーがとてもカッコイイ。

The Dredge is such a sick update. I'm glad we have a monsterous killer rather than another not-that-scary humanoid. The Plaything doll skin for Dredge is an amazing first skin too. I love the direction the developers have gone.
สนุกมากค่ะ #ดูเพื่อนเล่น

Dead by Daylight is like a game you've never played before. When you first start the game as the survivor role it feels so scary and horrifying. It makes you feel like you are inside a haunted house with some goon trying to get you around every corner. Then you try out the killer role and realize this feels like a completely different game. You are a menacing monster wanting to do anything to obtain and eventually kill the survivors. 

Then as you play and play you realize this horror genre tag like game has so much more depth and strategy then you first thought. You come to realize that there is so much mastery to be had within this fun themed game. The game then starts to feel much more competative. Then on top of that each match feels so fresh with  different randomized map layout each game. It keeps everyone on their toes.

I would not say this game is perfect however. There are some balancing issues and some QOL improvements to be made. However you will not notice most of them until you play 2K hours like me lol 

I think this game has come a long way and it truly shows it's a labor of love. Enjoy being new to this game because that is when it is the most fun!  See you in the fog.

As of patch 6.0 the game freezes on launch 100% of the time.

6/9 EDIT: Running Steam, not Dead by Daylight, in administrator mode finally got me in the game after multiple tries. As far as I've seen Behavior has not made any public statement on this bug yet. Fix your game Behavior.

EDIT 2: Matchmaking times out so it doesn't even matter. This is the only game I have issues with. Seriously Behavior, fix your game. Maybe consider using some of the artist hiring budget to get a few more people in the coding dungeon?

Una relación de amor y odio con el juego. Es entretenido, implementan nuevos mapas, asesinos, survivors, reworks de personjaes, nuevas perks blablabla pero la toxicidad siempre seguirá ahí, aveces sale algún q otro bug de cada update que la gente abusa en las partidas públicas pero al final los devs lo terminan corrigiendo. Sería re piola que metieran otro modo de juego ya que llego a un punto en donde hacer la misma rutina tanto de asesino como de killer se vuelve estresante y aburrido sabiendo que siempre habra alguien mejor  o peor que tu y eso hace la partida facil o dificil. Esto ultimo puede ser solo problema mio pero en general el juego esta bueno.
Very fun game, a fun glitches but they've been fixed. It's a great game to play with friends

I love DBD - definitely has opportunities for improvement but all around solid game. As a survivor I like the challenge of beating/outwitting someone faster/stronger than me and as a killer there's always something happening and every game is different, it's also fun to learn each of their unique abilities. If you like asymmetrical games that require skill and not just luck, this one is worth a shot.

Horribly unbalanced game, toxic player base, and a dev team that doesn't listen to their players.  More concerned with making new cosmetics and characters so they can sell micro transactions instead of doing things that improve the player experience
